title: [Feat]: Add tel: protocol support for Teams Phone Calls
body:
### Describe the feature

When clicking on a tel:[phonenumber] link teams should open a message box and ask for starting a call

### Motivation

My company is using Teams Phone as our telephone system. Would be cool if we were able to open tel: links in teams-for-linux.

### Alternatives

_No response_

### Additional context

On Windows it look like this
![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/5b257950-a85c-4a68-af87-0d228e2c729a)

I'm using Nobara as my distro.
I have added the following line to ~/.config/mimeapps.list
`x-scheme-handler/tel=teams-for-linux.desktop;`
It starts teams but then nothing happens.
